suspension_length.description: Length of suspension, set to same value as in physics file.

is_drivetrain_wheel.description: [bool]Whether the wheel is connected to the drivetrain or not, i.e. whether it applied engine force or rolls.

on_suspension_threshold.description: The percentage of suspension compression at which the on_suspension event is triggered.

on_suspension_maxed_threshold.description: The percentage of suspension compression at which the on_suspension_maxed event is triggered.

suspension_node.description: [string]The suspensions / wheel as it appears in the physics file.
